channel.title: Running 718 server on Linux
channel.description:
First time using linux VPS we have transferred all of our files over just started a new project new vps.
Im having some trouble with run.bat I can't get it to run normally I would but we don't have enough for windows yet. Help is appreciated. Just need to know how to run this on linux Mint
